page.title: 20A Beekeeper in Maresfield.
page.content: There is a{beekeeper}who lives in Maresfield park.He has 1 hive left.The bad winter killed 5 of the hives.He smokes the bees with a smoker so that he can take the honey.He collects bee swarms from other places.Although he keeps bees he does not grow flowers and beekeeping for a hobby.He gets stung 50 times a year and only takes the honey once a year.A pot of honey is Â£1.He sells it to friends and to Doma Farm Nursery.In the hive he has 50 thousand bees.He has now collected 2 more swarms.
